summary: This is a supplement to our report TRANSIT ASSET MANAGEMENT: FTA Should Clarify Performance Data and Develop a Plan to Guide Future Program Improvements , GAO-20-686 . We surveyed urban transit agencies and group Transit Asset Management plan sponsors (which are generally direct recipients of federal transit funding), about the Federal Transit Administration's Transit Asset Management program. We have collected the survey results in this...
title: Supplemental Material For GAO-20-686: Transit Asset Management: Survey of TAM Program Participants
